Key Match Events: India beat South Africa by 7 runs in the ICC T20 World Cup 2024 final.
Klaasen scored 52 runs for South Africa.
Post-Match Reflections: Kohli crowns a glittering T20I career with a trophy that has eluded him throughout his career.
Rohit Sharma adds another special chapter in his illustrious career.
President of India congratulated Team India for their never-say-die spirit.
Ian Raphael Bishop mentioned that South Africa's time will come in the future.
Azhar Ali congratulated Kohli on an incredible career and his match-winning knock.
VVS Laxman praised Rahul Dravid and the support staff for their behind-the-scenes work.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India win their second T20 World Cup trophy.
India became the first team to win the tournament unbeaten.
